name: HavocWear (Demo)
description:
In a world where major corporations control the people, a company named (NEXUS TECH ) have a total monopoly over the world data reserve thus using it to control everyone's lives, some day NEXUS TECH framed you with crimes you didn't do and took over your company, so you armed with the legendary hacking software (HavocWear) took the responsibility to hack their systems and take down their servers ones and for all,

Navigate through challenging levels and look for all the data centers and destroy them all to move to the next stage in this challenging action packed top down shooter

For more info please join our Discord
